choices.label: It is an oxidation-reduction reaction, and <math alttext="M g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is oxidized.

content.answer: It is an oxidation-reduction reaction, and <math alttext="M g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is oxidized.
